Boards Moderation Discord Verification
Keyru (NA) NA Player Support submitted 9 months ago in Discuss the Boards
⚠Click here to join us in the Boards Moderation Discord
This thread is to verify your account for the Boards Moderation Discord. Verification opens access to numerous channels to openly ask about the Boards, their moderation, support, or chill.

Post your Unique ID provided by Orion Bot here. After, type /verify with the permalink to your comment in the #verification room. Orion Bot should automatically verify you if you follow the process. Make sure to follow the rules, as this feature is a privilege and will be removed if abused.

Server Rules:

Always be respectful to volunteers and Rioters. Harassment and insults will not be tolerated.
Do not spam. Please.
This is a privilege and any abuse will result in a ban from using this service.
FAQ
What is Discord?
Discord is a third party text/voice service that can be accessed directly through your web browser with no download or signup, or with the Discord app. Because of Discord's ease of access, security, and customization, we have chosen to make it the Boards Moderator's base of operations to coordinate and to speak with you guys one-on-one.

How do I get into your Discord to talk to the moderators?
Follow the link on top of this page, and after creating an account or signing in as a guest the first course of action is to read the #welcome channel rules. This will tell you where to go to for reports and who to ping for it.

To use the #off-topic and #inquiries channels you'll need to get verified.

Once a moderator responsible for the board you need help on answers, they will pull you into a private room.

When all's said and done you'll be removed from the private room, but are free to stick around.

Players that violate our server rules or are banned from the Boards can't post for verification, but they’ll have access to the #violation-inquiries channel to discuss that with us.

What is the primary purpose for this Discord?
For players to provide context when reporting a post
To inquire on moderation or posting (rule clarification)
Discussing mod actions against you
Providing feedback on the above
What is this Discord not to be used for?
Anything prohibited by the Universal Rules or Terms of Use

No.

So I'll respond here, becuase you've made several threads now and there are some misconceptions here (and in other threads you've made on the subject).

---------------

1. Our discord has Riot approval, as shown by Riot Keyru making that post, it's prominent place in the board sidebar, the multiple Rioters we have on Discord, and it's official role in our moderation.

2. Discord doesn't interefere with League any more than Skype or, for that matter, Microsoft Word. You can turn off the overlay if you're concerned.

3. To my knowledge the Discord doesn't have API code to LET anyone get your IP, even if they wanted to. Further, they can't execute code on our Discord server either way, and we don't collect any data -- nor do we want to. All Orion Bot does is give some handy moderation commands.

4. We're not licensing it or selling it: we're just using a well-known free chat app for communication. No TOU problems at all.

5. We're not trying to steal your IP, money, kidneys, or souls. We just want a handy place to chat to you guys.
